devdoc.details: This contract implements the HTLC functionality for cross-chain swaps between Etherlink and NEAR using the 1inch Fusion+ pattern.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

completeSwap(string,string,address,uint2.details: Complete a cross-chain swap from another chain (to be called by relayer/oracle)

params.destinationAddress: Address to receive tokens on Etherlink
params.preimage: Secret that was revealed on the source chain
params.sourceAddress: Source address on the other chain

getLockContract(bytes32).details: Get details of a lock contract

params.lockContractId: The ID of the lock contract to get

hasLockContract(bytes32).details: Check if a lock contract exists

returns._0: exists True if the contract exists

initiateSwap(bytes32,address,uint256,uin.details: Initiates a cross-chain swap by locking tokens in the contract

params.endtime: Timestamp after which the sender can reclaim the tokens
params.recipient: Address that can withdraw the tokens with the secret
params.targetAddress: Target address on the other chain

returns.lockContractId: ID of the created lock contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refund(bytes32).details: Refund tokens to the sender if the timelock has expired

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(bytes32,string).details: Withdraw tokens by revealing the secret

params.preimage: Secret that hashes to the secretHash

devdoc.title: UnrealHTLC (Hash Time Lock Contract)
